text: Angely otvetili yey: "Neuzheli ty udivlyayesh'sya tomu, chto u vas roditsya syn, nesmotrya na vashu starost', a eto - poveleniye Allakha, vole kotorogo nikto ne mozhet protivostoyat'? Eto - miloserdiye i velikaya milost' ot Allakha nad vami, obitatelyami doma prorokov. Poetomu neudivitel'no, chto Allakh daruyet vam to, chto ne daruyet drugim! On vershit to, chto zasluzhivayet khvalu. On okazyvayet velikuyu milost', miloserdiye i blagovoleniye
